wave_equation_satisfaction: Ψ must satisfy d²Ψ/dχ² = δ²_μ Ψ + λ Ψ on R.
resonance_threshold: ψ(R) · λ(R) · μ(R) > Θ_c strictly; equality yields marginal or unstable modes.
truth_consistency: Π(Ψ) must not change under χ-evolution: d/dχ Π(Ψ) = 0.
omega_admissibility: Ω must classify the FSM as globally admissible; forbidden configurations are rejected irrespective of local resonance.
finite_support_or_decay: FSMs must either have finite support or sufficiently fast decay so that global integrals under Ω remain finite.
